title: About
content:
Finola Cahill is a multi-disciplinary artist from Ballina Co. Mayo. She has lived in Dublin, Italy, and Paris but returned to live in Mayo in 2021.

Finolaâ€™s poetry has been shortlisted for the Bridport Prize 2023, the Fish Poetry Prize 2023, and the Listowel Writers Week Collection Award 2023. Her work has been published in journals such as the London Magazine, and a full list of her publications can be
